solution_line_template: In three years, Sue will be {sue_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{sue_current_age}+{years_in_future}={sue_age_in_3_years}>>{sue_age_in_3_years}.
In three years, Same will be {sam_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{sam_current_age}+{years_in_future}={sam_age_in_3_years}>>{sam_age_in_3_years}.
In three years, Kendra will be {kendra_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{kendra_current_age}+{years_in_future}={kendra_age_in_3_years}>>{kendra_age_in_3_years}.

Their total age in three years is {sue_age_in_3_years} + {sam_age_in_3_years} + {kendra_age_in_3_years} = <<{sue_age_in_3_years}+{sam_age_in_3_years}+{kendra_age_in_3_years}={total_age_in_3_years}>>{total_age_in_3_years}.
